001package com.github.sormuras.bach.conventional;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Grabber;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolCall;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolFinder;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolRun;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.Composer;
010import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.DefaultCommand;
011import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JarCommand;
012import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JavacCommand;
013import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.ModulePathsOption;
014import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleFinderSupport;
015import java.io.File;
016import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
017import java.nio.file.Files;
018import java.nio.file.Path;
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020
021/** This interface contains the methods to build a convential project space. */
022public interface ConventionalBuilder {
023
024  Bach bach();
025
026  ConventionalSpace space();
027
028  default void grab(Grabber grabber, String... externalModules) {
029    grabber.grabExternalModules(externalModules);
030    grabber.grabMissingExternalModules();
031  }
032
033  default void compile() {
034    compile(Composer.identity(), Composer.identity());
035  }
036
037  default void compile(Composer<JavacCommand> javacComposer, Composer<JarCommand> jarComposer) {
038    var classesDirectory = outputDirectoryForClasses();
039    var javac =
040        new JavacCommand()
041            .release(space().release().orElse(null))
042            .modules(space().toModuleNames())
043            .option(space().moduleSourcePaths())
044            .option(computeModulePathOption())
045            .outputDirectoryForClasses(classesDirectory);
046    bach().run(javacComposer.apply(javac));
047
048    var modulesDirectory = outputDirectoryForModules();
049    bach().run(Command.of("directories", "clean", modulesDirectory));
050    var jars = new ArrayList<JarCommand>();
051    for (var module : space().modules()) {
052      var jarCommand =
053          new JarCommand()
054              .mode("--create")
055              .file(modulesDirectory.resolve(module.name() + ".jar"))
056              .main(module.main().orElse(null))
057              .filesAdd(classesDirectory.resolve(module.name()));
058      jars.add(jarComposer.apply(jarCommand));
059    }
060    jars.parallelStream().forEach(bach()::run);
061  }
062
063  default void document(Composer<DefaultCommand> javadocComposer) {
064    var api = bach().path().workspace(space().name().orElse(""), "documentation", "api");
065    var javadoc =
066        Command.of("javadoc")
067            .add("--module", String.join(",", space().toModuleNames()))
068            .add(
069                "--module-source-path",
070                String.join(File.pathSeparator, space().moduleSourcePaths().values()))
071            .add("-d", api);
072    if (!space().modulePaths().isPresent()) {
073      javadoc = javadoc.add("--module-path", space().modulePaths().join(File.pathSeparator));
074    }
075
076    bach().run(javadocComposer.apply(javadoc));
077
078    var jar =
079        Command.jar()
080            .mode("--create")
081            .file(api.getParent().resolve("api.zip"))
082            .add("--no-manifest")
083            .filesAdd(api);
084    bach().run(jar);
085  }
086
087  default void link(Composer<DefaultCommand> jlinkComposer) {
088    var image = bach().path().workspace(space().name().orElse(""), "image");
089    var jlink =
090        Command.of("jlink")
091            .add("--output", image)
092            .add("--add-modules", String.join(",", space().toModuleNames()))
093            .add(
094                "--module-path",
095                String.join(
096                    File.pathSeparator,
097                    outputDirectoryForModules().toString(),
098                    bach().path().externalModules().toString()));
099
100    bach().run("directories", run -> run.add("delete").add(image));
101    bach().run(jlinkComposer.apply(jlink));
102  }
103
104  default Path outputDirectoryForClasses() {
105    return bach().path().workspace(space().name().orElse(""), "classes");
106  }
107
108  default Path outputDirectoryForModules() {
109    return bach().path().workspace(space().name().orElse(""), "modules");
110  }
111
112  default Path outputDirectoryForReports() {
113    return bach().path().workspace(space().name().orElse(""), "reports");
114  }
115
116  private ModulePathsOption computeModulePathOption() {
117    var option = space().modulePaths();
118    var externalModules = bach().path().externalModules();
119    if (option.values().contains(externalModules)) return option;
120    if (!Files.isDirectory(externalModules)) return option;
121    return option.add(externalModules);
122  }
123
124  private ModuleFinder computeRuntimeModuleFinder() {
125    var paths = new ArrayList<Path>();
126    paths.add(outputDirectoryForModules());
127    paths.addAll(computeModulePathOption().values());
128    return ModuleFinder.of(paths.toArray(Path[]::new));
129  }
130
131  default ConventionalSpace newDependentConventionalSpace(String name) {
132    return ConventionalSpace.of(bach(), name).modulePaths(outputDirectoryForModules());
133  }
134
135  default void runAllTests() {
136    bach().logCaption("Run all tests in %s space".formatted(space().name().orElse("this")));
137    var moduleFinder = computeRuntimeModuleFinder();
138    for (var module : space().modules()) {
139      var name = module.name();
140      if (ModuleFinderSupport.findMainClass(moduleFinder, name).isPresent()) {
141        runModule(moduleFinder, name, Composer.identity(), bach().printer()::print);
142      }
143      var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(moduleFinder, true, name);
144      runTool(toolFinder, "test", Composer.identity(), bach().printer()::print);
145      if (toolFinder.find("junit").isPresent()) runJUnit(toolFinder, name);
146    }
147  }
148
149  default void runModule(String module, Composer<DefaultCommand> composer) {
150    runModule(computeRuntimeModuleFinder(), module, composer, bach().printer()::print);
151  }
152
153  default void runModule(
154      ModuleFinder finder,
155      String module,
156      Composer<DefaultCommand> composer,
157      ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
158    var command = composer.apply(Command.of(module));
159    var call = ToolCall.module(finder, command);
160    var run = bach().run(call);
161    visitor.accept(run);
162  }
163
164  default void runTool(String tool, Composer<DefaultCommand> composer) {
165    var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(computeRuntimeModuleFinder(), true);
166    runTool(toolFinder, tool, composer, bach().printer()::print);
167  }
168
169  default void runTool(
170      ToolFinder finder, String tool, Composer<DefaultCommand> composer, ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
171    for (var provider : finder.list(tool)) {
172      var singleton = ToolFinder.of(provider);
173      var command = composer.apply(Command.of(tool));
174      var call = ToolCall.of(singleton, command);
175      var run = bach().run(call);
176      visitor.accept(run);
177    }
178  }
179
180  default void runJUnit(String module) {
181    var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(computeRuntimeModuleFinder(), true, module);
182    runJUnit(toolFinder, module);
183  }
184
185  default void runJUnit(ToolFinder finder, String module) {
186    runJUnit(finder, module, Composer.identity(), ToolRun.Visitor.noop());
187  }
188
189  default void runJUnit(
190      ToolFinder finder,
191      String module,
192      Composer<DefaultCommand> composer,
193      ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
194    var reports = outputDirectoryForReports().resolve("junit/" + module);
195    var junit = Command.of("junit").add("--select-module", module).add("--reports-dir", reports);
196    var call = ToolCall.of(finder, composer.apply(junit));
197    var run = bach().run(call);
198    visitor.accept(run);
199  }
200}
